cast.overview: A girl who halfheartedly tries to be part of the "in crowd" of her school meets a rebel who teaches her a more devious way to play social politics: by killing the popular kids.
cast.title: Heathers

details.biography: John is of Russian descent and was raised on the east coast. He's a man of many talents, including juggling. His 1st TV gig was on Tales from the Darkside, where he played a Peter Pan-like character opposite veteran actor Dick Shawn. He also received rave reviews for his appearance in Master Harold and the Boys on stage in San Diego in 1986.  IMDb Mini Biography By: Young, Scott
details.name: John Zarchen
